backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles and admin‑gated CRUD APIs for products using access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light and dark theme color tokens and global background/foreground rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with public storefront routes and protected admin routes under a shared layout.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminEmpty: Displays an empty-state screen prompting admins to create their first product with a CTA button.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductFor: Form component for creating or editing products with validation and price conversion logic.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout component providing header, footer, and main content structure.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Protects admin routes by checking authentication, profile setup, and admin role before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication state and retry logic.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to enter a name and save their profile before proceeding.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying attribution with a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with navigation, admin link logic, and mobile menu using role and authentication state.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a product card with image, details, price, and links to the product details page.
frontend/src/components/ProductImage.tsx: Image component providing a placeholder fallback when the provided image fails or is missing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, and persisted identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductMutations.t: React Query mutations for creating, updating, and deleting products using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks to fetch products, user roles, and profiles, plus saving user profiles.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining light/dark theme colors.
frontend/src/lib/format.ts: Utility function for formatting a bigint price in cents into a USD currency string.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductEdi: Admin page for editing or deleting a product, including form handling and mutation logic.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductNew: Admin page for creating a new product using a form and create mutation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin dashboard listing all products with actions to add, edit, or delete items.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Displays a single product with image, details, loading and error states, and a contact button.
frontend/src/pages/StorefrontPage.tsx: Shows a hero section and a products grid with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, existing features, pending feature requests, and required image assets for a product-listing website. Tracks schema versioning, project metadata, and functional requirements.
